Groq-Based Smart Reader is a lightning-fast AI assistant that reads, analyzes, and summarizes documents in real time. Powered by Groqâ€™s LPUs, it offers ultra-low latency, supports multimodal inputs, and delivers smart, contextual insights instantly for any content.

AI-powered web app that recommends the best-quality photos from user uploads by analyzing clarity, composition, and context using the Google Gemini API. Built with React, Node.js, and Express, it features secure Google OAuth, drag-and-drop uploads, cloud storage, and automated CI/CD.
